short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Brighten your day with a Random Joke Generator

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
✨ Need a quick laugh to brighten your day? Meet your new favorite Chrome extension: Random Joke Generator! 🎉

With just one click, you'll discover hilarious jokes 🤣 that will make you smile no matter the mood. From quirky one-liners to clever punchlines, this extension is your personal joke buddy! 🎭

✅ Simple to Use: Click, laugh, repeat!
✅ Always Fresh: Get a new joke every time!
✅ Mood Booster: Perfect for a quick break or sharing laughs with friends. 😄

Download now and let the fun begin! 🚀✨
